data.actual_result: You can only use ESC after you closed the User Settings manually
data.expected_result: You can use ESC again to close the menu, as the keybind has been deleted
data.short_description: Removing "ESC" as one of your keybinds doesn't re-activate the built-in shortcut until you close the User Settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Keybinds - Add a new Keybind for your action of choice and bind it to ESC - Delete the Keybind and try to press ESC to opt out of/close the menu
